features: Travel Luggage with Wheels: With 19 x 15 x 9 inches of packing space, this rolling suitcase is the perfect size for any trip; Carry all your essentials without adding unnecessary bulk - this carry-on bag measures 22 x 15.5 x 9.25 inches overall

Durable Design: Designed to withstand wear and tear without compromising on quality or appearance, our spinner luggage features a durable ABS construction and co-molded lift handles with soft rubber hand grips for added comfort

Multi-Directional Spinner Wheels: Provide maximum maneuverability, so you can easily navigate busy airports and small spaces; Each travel suitcase also comes equipped with a premium, push-button steel locking telescopic handle
Expandable Design: This roller suitcase features a variety of internal pockets for easy organization and expands up to 2" to provide additional packing space

10-Year Warranty: Tested to meet stringent standards, our rolling luggage comes with a 10-year warranty against defects in materials and workmanship, so customers can rest easy knowing that their purchase is protected
body.description: SwissGear 8028 Hardside Expandable Luggage with Spinner Wheels is the perfect carry-on luggage for your next trip. This 19-inch suitcase is made of durable ABS and includes co-molded lift handle(s) with soft rubber hand grips for easy maneuverability. The split-case design expands 2" for additional packing space and a variety of internal pockets keep you organized. The eight 360-degree multi-directional spinner wheels and a premium, push-button steel locking telescopic handle make it easy to navigate through the airport. With outside dimensions of 22 x 15.5 x 9.25 inches including wheels and handles, this suitcase offers 19 x 15 x 9 inches of packing space. This hardside luggage is perfect for those who need a lightweight and durable suitcase for their travels. The hardshell exterior is designed to protect your belongings from the wear and tear of travel, while the spinner wheels make it easy to move around. The telescopic handle is designed to be comfortable and easy to use, and the internal pockets help you stay organized. Plus, this suitcase comes with a 10 year warranty against defects in materials and workmanship.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 8028 Hardside Expandable Carry On 19" Spinner Luggage Make your next journey effortless with the SwissGear 8028 19" Hardside Spinner Carry-On Luggage. Featuring unique contrasting colors to make spotting it on airport conveyer belts easier, this carry-on suitcase is constructed with an ABS hardshell and eight 360-degree multi-directional spinner wheels for maximum maneuverability. Plus, with two inches of expansion built in and a zippered interior divider panel with large mesh pocket plus adjustable web tie-down straps, staying organized is a breeze.

Locking Telescopic Handle With a reinforced push button locking handle with an integrated side and bottom handle, this roller suitcase makes lifting and carrying your luggage easy. Multi-Directional Spinner Wheels Our state-of-the-art in-line wheels incorporate sealed steel ball bearings and are mounted on solid axles in custom-designed, shock-absorbing bushings. They roll smoothly and quietly for miles. Divider Panels Interior zippered divider panels keep contents organized, separated, and secured in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and good price
reviews.reviewText: Used for trip from west coast of the United States to the Hawaiian islands and back to Portland Oregon the suitcase is perfect for air travel and trips by train, car, or bus it’s very nice to be able to expand it if needed it’s also extremely durable, it rolls easily the extendable handle is great for pulling the luggage behind you or for securing other items to it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly durable and easy to spot at baggage claim
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. As stated in the video, this luggage is surprisingly durable and very easy to spot at baggage claim. To start, I'm a full-time musician who travels and flies quite a bit. I needed new luggage that would fit wardrobe, equipment, and street clothes and this suitcase does just that. When I first got it, I was worried by how flimsy the hardshell felt. However, after a few months, and roughly half a dozen flights, I gotta say this thing holds up better than I expected. We're all well aware of how airlines handle luggage, and yet so far this suitcase only has a few scuffs here and there.Space-wise, I was able to pack everything listed above for 5-day trips with some room to spare. In the past, I was weary about the space in the hardshell clam suitcases (because of the equipment I fly with), but this luggage proved me wrong. The wheels are still in working condition, and the handle lifts and lowers smoothly which also feels a little flimsy but is surprisingly sturdy. I also picked out this suitcase because of the color. The somewhat odd dual-color makes this thing very easy to spot at baggage claim. Even for someone who needs glasses like myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy wheels around good and it cute! The only thing I don’t like is that the handle is a lil wobbly but overall I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice looking and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: I have not traveled with them yet, but from a cost standpoint I think these are a real value. I got a carryon plus a 24" and 28". They do not come with TSA locks, though easy to buy locks yourself. At this price point though even without locks I feel these are a tremendous value. Wheels move smoothly, zippers seems very sturdy, they all are expandable, plus they are really nice looking and will standout when trying to identify your luggage from other's. I have a carryon with a TSA lock and I can only remember using it one time when I had a connection flight on a Bombardier that couldn't accommodate even the smallest carryon so I had to gate check it. With that being said I don't think the TSA lock is worth the additional costs to get luggage with that feature. Overall super happy with my purchase and I feel this luggage will last a very long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke on my first trip!
reviews.reviewText: I received this suitcase on a Thursday, flew Friday morning and by the time I received my luggage at my destination not even 2 hours later the side aides were broken off. For a more luxury brand, and not cheap, I am very disappointed as the screws are now scratching me and any interior/fabric the suitcase encounters. As a “brand new” purchase I am no longer able to return it, and would have to deal with these obstacles if I continue to use, as I frequently travel around every 6 weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this luggage! Light weight, sturdy great for a quick get away

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s fine…. But you can find better product for the money
reviews.reviewText: The luggage will get you through a trip or two, but I wouldn’t expect it to last. It’s more flimsy across the board than I expected, and the interior storage is a bit of a joke. It did the job on my recent vacation, but I wish I had spent just a bit more on more quality luggage .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the size, color, quality, and storage pockets. Great job Swiss Gear!
